org.apache.ignite.igfs

Interface IgfsMetrics


  • public interface IgfsMetrics
    IGFS metrics snapshot for the file system. Note, that some metrics are global and some are local (i.e. per each node).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long blocksReadRemote()
      Gets total remote blocks read.
      long blocksReadTotal()
      Gets total blocks read, local and remote.
      long blocksWrittenRemote()
      Gets total remote blocks written.
      long blocksWrittenTotal()
      Gets total blocks written, local and remote.
      long bytesRead()
      Gets total bytes read.
      long bytesReadTime()
      Gets total bytes read time.
      long bytesWriteTime()
      Gets total bytes write time.
      long bytesWritten()
      Gets total bytes written.
      int directoriesCount()
      Gets number of directories created in file system.
      int filesCount()
      Gets number of files stored in file system.
      int filesOpenedForRead()
      Gets number of files that are currently opened for reading.
      int filesOpenedForWrite()
      Gets number of files that are currently opened for writing.
      long localSpaceSize()
      Gets local used space in bytes.
      long maxSpaceSize()
      Gets maximum amount of data that can be stored on local node.
      long secondarySpaceSize()
      Get used space in bytes used in the secondary file system.

    • Method Detail

      • localSpaceSize

        long localSpaceSize()
        Gets local used space in bytes. This is the sum of all file chunks stored on local node.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Node used space in bytes.

      • maxSpaceSize

        long maxSpaceSize()
        Gets maximum amount of data that can be stored on local node. This metrics is either equal to FileSystemConfiguration.getMaxSpaceSize(), or, if it is 0, equal to 80% of maximum heap size allocated for JVM.
        Returns:
        Maximum IGFS local space size.

      • secondarySpaceSize

        long secondarySpaceSize()
        Get used space in bytes used in the secondary file system.

        This is a global metric.

        Returns:
        Used space in the secondary file system or 0 in case no secondary file system is configured.

      • directoriesCount

        int directoriesCount()
        Gets number of directories created in file system.

        This is a global metric.

        Returns:
        Number of directories.

      • filesCount

        int filesCount()
        Gets number of files stored in file system.

        This is a global metric.

        Returns:
        Number of files.

      • filesOpenedForRead

        int filesOpenedForRead()
        Gets number of files that are currently opened for reading.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Number of opened files.

      • filesOpenedForWrite

        int filesOpenedForWrite()
        Gets number of files that are currently opened for writing.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Number of opened files.

      • blocksReadTotal

        long blocksReadTotal()
        Gets total blocks read, local and remote.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total blocks read.

      • blocksReadRemote

        long blocksReadRemote()
        Gets total remote blocks read.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total blocks remote read.

      • blocksWrittenTotal

        long blocksWrittenTotal()
        Gets total blocks written, local and remote.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total blocks written.

      • blocksWrittenRemote

        long blocksWrittenRemote()
        Gets total remote blocks written.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total blocks written.

      • bytesRead

        long bytesRead()
        Gets total bytes read.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total bytes read.

      • bytesReadTime

        long bytesReadTime()
        Gets total bytes read time.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total bytes read time.

      • bytesWritten

        long bytesWritten()
        Gets total bytes written.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total bytes written.

      • bytesWriteTime

        long bytesWriteTime()
        Gets total bytes write time.

        This is a local metric.

        Returns:
        Total bytes write time.
